WorkItem.Description:
An error pops up when I load a character.xml file created from a previous version of RAWR (but recent - no more than a day older than the current version 4.1.1.0). After closing it, the character seems loaded, but the stat boxes are empty and the gear list on the right hand side reports all items valued at 0.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Launch Rawr
2) File > Open Character File
3) Select Exo Fire.xml
4) Click the "OK" button
5) Observe the error message
 
Additional Information:
Rawr v4.1.1.0
Google Chrome / Windows Vista Home Premium
== Error Message ==
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentException(ExceptionResource resource)
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Insert(TKey key, TValue value, Boolean add)
   at Rawr.Mage.DisplayCalculations.GetCharacterDisplayCalculationValues(Boolean computeReconstruction)
   at Rawr.Mage.CharacterCalculationsMage.GetCharacterDisplayCalculationValues()
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.character_CalculationsInvalidated(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.set_Character(Character value)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.OpenCharacter(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs args)
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(MouseButtonEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(Control ctrl, EventArgs e)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, Int32 actualArgsTypeIndex, String eventName)
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentException(ExceptionResource resource)
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Insert(TKey key, TValue value, Boolean add)
   at Rawr.Mage.DisplayCalculations.GetCharacterDisplayCalculationValues(Boolean computeReconstruction)
   at Rawr.Mage.CharacterCalculationsMage.GetCharacterDisplayCalculationValues()
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.character_CalculationsInvalidated(Object sender, EventArgs e)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.set_Character(Character value)
   at Rawr.UI.MainPage.OpenCharacter(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs args)
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnClick()
   at System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(MouseButtonEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(Control ctrl, EventArgs e)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, Int32 actualArgsTypeIndex, String eventName)

Comments.Message: Fixed for next release. As a workaround edit the xml and change aoe targets to more than 1.
